CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Spruce Power Holding Corp is a renewable-focused Power-as-a-Service company offering solar battery installation and maintenance services, It provides subscription-based services for homeowners and small businesses to own and maintain rooftop solar and battery storage. Its solutions offerings comprise Battery Bundles and System Expansion Options.
